price: Ka ce wa waɗanda suka kãfirta: "Za a rinjãye ku, kuma a tãraku zuwa Jahannama, kuma shimfiɗar tã mũnana!
arabic: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَتُغۡلَبُونَ وَتُحۡشَرُونَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul lilladhīna kafarū satugh'labūna watuḥ'sharūna ilā jahannama wabi'sa al-mihādu
